content: first top down sweater start here 2nd row ws p115-115-113 113-113-109 109-107- using us 1½ 2 5 mm needles and the long tail cast 101 slipping markers work a shadow wrap turn on co 160 sts place a marker for the beginning of 3rd row k to marker m1l sm k2 sm m1r x 4 k to 3 round and join in the round sts past the last wrap work a shadow wrap turn 4th row p to 3 sts past the last wrap slipping markers setup round rs k2 pm k20-20-18 18-16-14 14-12-6 work a shadow wrap turn pm k2 pm k56-56-58 58-60-62 62-64-70 pm k2 pm k20-20-18 18-16-14 14-12-6 pm k2 pm k to repeat the last two row 4 more times end next row rs k to marker m1l sm k2 sm m1r x 2 next round p to end slipping markers k to marker m1l do not turn work next round k to end slipping markers next round rs sm k2 sm m1r k to marker m1l x 4 next round p to end slipping markers next round k to end slipping markers repeat the last two rounds two more times change repeat the last two row 1-0-1 11-12-19 26-26-37 to us 2½ 3 0 mm needles more times 224-216-224 304-312-368 424-424-512 sts raglan increases sizes xxs-xs-s m1-m2-l1 l2-xl next round rs sm k2 sm m1r k to marker m1l x 4 next you will shape the neckline using short row next round k to end slipping markers technique and begin working raglan increases the next round k to end slipping markers short row are worked with shadow wraps see techniques at the end of the pattern repeat the last three row 15-17-17 11-11-7 3-5 more times 352-360-368 400-408-432 456-472 sts 1st row rs k2 sm m1r k to marker m1l sm k2 sm m1r k4 work a shadow wrap turn copyright @ anna johanna 2018 all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only 3 pattern support pm annaj0hanna on ravelry neulisti mnk@gmail com body work stockinette stitch straight until the sleeve measures 10 5 / 27 cm from the underarm setup round rs rm k1 place the next 70-72-72 80- change to us 1½ 2 5 mm needles and work the 80-84 90-92-96 sts on a holder removing markers sleeve cuffs same as the hem bind off co 2-2-3 3-3-3 4-6-6 sts using knitted cast on pm co 2-2-3 3-3-3 4-6-6 sts k1 rm k to marker rm k1 place the next 70-72-72 80-80-84 90-92-96 sts on a finishing holder removing markers co 4-4-6 6-6-6 8-12-12 sts using knitted cast on k1 rm k to the only marker left this is now the beginning of round 220-224-236 weave in all ends place the dress in lukewarm water 252-260-276 292-312-344 sts and let soak thoroughly gently squeeze out the next round k to end excess water and place the dress on a towel roll in to remove further moisture repeat the last round until the piece
